data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Puebla.
In the minute 6, America awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Puebla have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
Puebla are coming forward and Maximiliano Perg gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 6, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards America a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a America goal kick.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to America in their own half.
In the minute 8, Free kick for America in the half of Puebla.
Puebla have a goal kick.
America awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 10, Free kick for Puebla in their own half.
Ball safe as Puebla is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Puebla in their own half.
In the minute 12, Puebla are pushing forward but Israel Reyes's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for America at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
Emanuel Aguilera of America gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 15, Ball goes out of play for a Puebla goal kick.
In Puebla a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick in a good position for Puebla!
In the minute 17, Corner awarded to Puebla.
Goal! Puebla have taken a 1-0 lead courtesy of a header from Amaury Escoto.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a America throw-in in Puebla's half.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Puebla at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Puebla.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 24, Goal kick for America at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
America awarded a free kick in their own half.
Daniel Arreola is booked for the home team.
In the minute 28, Free kick for America in their own half.
Free kick for America in their own half.
Throw-in for America in their own half.
In the minute 30, Goal! Bernardo Cuesta extends Puebla's lead to 2-0.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to America in their own half.
In the minute 33, Puebla's Osvaldo Martinez misses with an attempt on goal.
America have a goal kick.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards Puebla a goal kick.
In the minute 35, America awarded a free kick in their own half.
America have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
Important block from the Puebla defence as Emanuel Aguilera fires in a strike for America.
In the minute 36, Corner awarded to America.
America push forward at Estadio Cuauhtemoc and Sebastian Cordova gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Puebla defence.
America have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
In the minute 39, It's a goal kick for the home team in Puebla.
Can America get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Puebla's half?
Free kick America.
In the minute 41, The away team have replaced Sebastian Cordova with Nicolas Benedetti. This is the first substitution made today by Miguel Herrera.
Leonardo Suarez is replacing Antonio Lopez Amenabar for America at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
Corner awarded to America.
In the minute 43, America have a dangerous throw-in.
Puebla to take a throw-in in America territory.
Throw-in for Puebla in the half of America.
In the minute 45, America awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards Puebla a goal kick.
Puebla have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
The second-half is underway in Puebla.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Puebla in their own half.
In the minute 47, Free kick for Puebla in their own half.
Throw-in America.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Puebla just outside America's area.
In the minute 49, Puebla drive upfield and Osvaldo Martinez gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a America defender.
Corner awarded to Puebla.
Ball goes out of play for a America goal kick.
In the minute 51, An attacking America player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Emanuel Aguilera's spot-kick reduces the deficit 2-1.
America's Leonardo Suarez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 54, Puebla have a goal kick.
America have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
Goal! Henry Martin (America) levels the score at 2-2 with a header.
In the minute 58, Puebla's Alejandro Chumacero misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for America at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
Corner awarded to Puebla.
In the minute 59, It's a goal kick for the home team in Puebla.
The home team replace Osvaldo Martinez with Christian Tabo.
In the minute 60, Puebla awarded a free kick in their own half.
Puebla make their second substitution with Omar Fernandez replacing Bernardo Cuesta.
Can America get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Puebla's half?
Can America capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Puebla's half?
In the minute 62, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Puebla.
Can America capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Puebla have a goal kick.
In the minute 65, Brayan Angulo is replacing Alejandro Chumacero for the home team.
Goal! America have got their heads in front thanks to a Federico Vinas strike.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to America in their own half.
In the minute 69, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a throw-in for Puebla, close to America's area.
Puebla's Omar Fernandez breaks free at Estadio Cuauhtemoc. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards America a goal kick.
In the minute 71, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a America goal kick.
Throw-in for Puebla at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
In the minute 74, Daniel Arreola is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Free kick for Puebla in their own half.
Pueblaâ€™s Daniel Arreola is on his feet again at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
In the minute 78, Throw-in Puebla.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a Puebla throw-in in America's half.
America awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Daniel Aguilar is on a sub for Israel Reyes for Puebla.
In the minute 79, Juan Reynoso (Puebla) is making a fifth change, with Alan Acosta replacing the possibly injured Daniel Arreola.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Puebla.
In the minute 81, Goal kick for Puebla at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to America in their own half.
Puebla to take a throw-in in America territory.
In the minute 84, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Puebla in the half of America.
Emanuel Gularte for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 87, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a Puebla throw-in in America's half.
Santiago Caseres is on a sub for Richard Sanchez for America.
Free kick for America in their own half.
Ball safe as Puebla is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Puebla's Omar Fernandez is on target but unsuccessful.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
America awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to America.
Puebla have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Puebla.
Goal kick for America at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
The match has come to a close in Puebla. The final score is 2-3.
Giovani Dos Santos is replacing Henry Martin for the away team.
